New Records: Morocco secured their 1st win at AFCON
Key Match Events: Captain Romain Saiss opened the scoreline for Morocco in the 30th minute
Azzedine Ounahi solidified Morocco’s position after scoring a second goal in the 77th goal
Youssef En-Nesyri brought comfort by scoring the third in the 80th minute
Pre-Game Insights: The website Opta predicted Morocco to win the game with ease
Many predictions placed Morocco as a favorite to win today’s game
Head Coach Walid Regragui reiterated his call for caution as Morocco looks to win a second continental trophy
Post-Match Reflections: The Atlas Lions coach said in his post-match press conference that the win was important for Morocco to enter the competitive atmosphere
Miscellaneous Highlights: Morocco’s Afcon record is unspectacular, having won the continental trophy only once
The Atlas Lions’ eye-catching and historic performances at the 2022 World Cup in Qatar have made them most watchers’ main favorites to win this year’s continental trophy
Others: Morocco’s opening game in the Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON) was against Tanzania
